bibl.title: Chartae Latinae Antiquiores. Facsimile-Edition of the Latin Charters Prior to the Ninth Century. Part XLIX. Concordanze. Published by Tiziano DORANDI.
bibl.note: Con questo volume si completa la prima serie delle Chartae Latinae Antiquiores. - [2nd series. Ninth Century. Part L, etc.]
BRUCKNER Albert † and Robert MARICHAL, Chartae Latinae Antiquiores. Facsimile-Edition of the Latin Charters Prior to the Ninth Century. Part XLIX. Concordanze. Published by Tiziano DORANDI.
Dietikon - Zürich, Urs Graf Verlag, 1998, in fol., 114 pp., ill. ISBN 3-85951-187-4.
